plot: Unlike other children, Pipkin is allergic to electricity. One day, just before Christmas, a very special guest comes to visit.
title: The Tale of Pipkin Puddyfoot
plot_es: Unlike other children, Pipkin is allergic to electricity. One day, just before Christmas, a very special guest comes to visit.
plot_en: Unlike other children, Pipkin is allergic to electricity. One day, just before Christmas, a very special guest comes to visit.
